ForgotPasswordText: Do not worry! We will help you recover it. Enter the e-mail address associated to your account.
ImageSubmissionText: If the app was not able to detect your item, upload a picture of it so that it can be used to help improve the app.
YourImageWasFail: Selected image was not submitted Please try again later.
DeleteAccountText: This action will delete all your data from your device and cloud. This action is irreversable.
VerifyEmailText: Enter the passcode we sent to your email
OurMission: Our mission is to divert and reduce as much waste on campus away from landfill, and instead reduce, reuse, recycle and compost.
AboutUsPart1: Digitizing Waste is an open collaboration based out of Concordia University, in Montreal, Canada, that aims to accelerate adoption of circular economy through data-driven tools.
AboutUsPart2: Our waste sorting app was developed by a group of capstone students in SOEN 490 with the supervision of members of CP3 and ZWC.
AboutUsPart4: CP3 is a multi-disciplinary student-led initiative supporting Concordia Universityâ€™s plastic waste management by recycling plastic on-site and raising awareness of the plastic crisis. We are a group of students across all four faculties united by the goal of protecting the environment and giving plastic waste a new life.
AboutUsPart5: We are grateful for your contributions to this project! By testing the app and submitting your waste images, you are helping to train our algorithm that we hope will demystify waste sorting around the planet.
AboutUsPart6: Want to contribute to the development of this project and other smart waste initiatives? Contact us at:
